nodes.text: That Boom blasted right through the metal grate.
With a massive monster chasing after me, I don't really have the time to inspect things right now.
It's a grate on the floor over a pool of lava. Seems like an odd place to put a grate, but I'm no architect.
Even with my life on the line, I don't think pulling up a grate so that I can jump into a pool of lava to be a viable alternative.
No... Maybe I should have become a fighter?
I don't have anything on me that I can place on the grate right now.
I don't think it'll be effective enough against a Giant Stone Golem!
I think we're getting the idea, but I would like something with a bit more firepower. You know for insurance.
That might slow him down, but I think I want something that'll do a bit more permanent damage.
Even a Mighty Trap might not be mighty enough to damage a Stone Golem.
Let's hope that knocks some sense into that thing!
I've already got that one handled.
